string.Data:

string.name: party_invite_email_body
string.Data:
" You are invited to a fun online shopping party - %1$s. View the full invite - %2$s.

To attend download the free Poshmark App - %3$s "

string.Data:
" Join me and shop the most fashionable closets at the %1$s. Check it out - %2$s.

Download the free Poshmark App - %3$s "

resources.string: "You're invited to shop a %1$s. Don't miss out!"

Pin others’ listings when you share items you love on Poshmark

Shop %1$s now on Poshmark! The best way to shop street style and fashion at discounted prices.
Join millions of women who love Poshmark, the #1 destination to buy and sell fashion.
An item is New With Tags (NWT) if it is brand-new, unused, and has all of its original tags attached.
"An item is New With Tags (NWT) if it is brand-new, unused, and has all of its original tags attached. For more information, please visit Poshmark's NWT Policy."
An item is New With Tags Retail if it has been purchased directly from a brand or distributor and is now being sold for the first time.
You are almost done! Now fill out your profile so that we can help you find the closets that are best for you.

Save items by liking so you can shop them later.
Make your closet sell faster by making it visible to search engines like Google.
You can select up to 4 sizes.

string.Data:
"

Hi there!

I've been finding a lot of great deals while shopping %3$s on Poshmark. You should check it out!

-%4$s

"
